attributes.additional_details: They could trigger people with PTSD and make them feel very uncomfortable and then have a panic attack or an anxiety attack, same for people with other mental health issues. They may cause pets to shake due to being nervous and then go into shock and then unfortunately pass away (this has happened to a family I know and this has affected the family's mental health!
attributes.background: Ban fireworks, because they may trigger people with ptsd, anxiety, adhd and a lot more mental health issues. They scare numerous amount of animals, may cause pets to go into shock then unfortunately pass away! If they can't ban fireworks at least only sell quiet ones!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
